dashboard.label: Coronavirus - Timelapse
dashboard.description: This data is sourced from https://github.com/CSSEGISandData/COVID-19. Expect updates to the data about once per day. This Dashboard will continuously loop through to paint a picture of the outbreak from the first day of records, up until today.

search.query: | fields - Lat Long "Province/State" | rename "Country/Region" as Country | stats sum(*) as * by Country | dedup Country | transpose 0 column_name=_time header_field=Country | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%m/%d/%y") | eval time=_time | eval starttime="01012020" | eval time2=strptime(starttime,"%m%d%Y") | eval days=floor((_time-time2)/86400) | appendcols [ | rest splunk_server=local /services/authentication/current-context | table username] | filldown username | search [|inputlookup user_timer | rename inc as days | table days username] | fields _time | eval time=_time | eval time2=strftime(time,"%m/%d/%y") | fields time2

| inputlookup user_timer | append [| rest /services/authentication/current-context | table username | rename username as username2 ] | sort 0 - username2 | filldown username2 | eval username=case(isnull(username), username2, 1=1, username) | where username=username2 | eval inc=case(isnull(inc), 0, 1=1, inc+1 ) | eval now=now() | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%m/%d/%y") | eval time=_time | eval starttime="01012020" | eval time2=strptime(starttime,"%m%d%Y") | eval days=floor(((now+86400)-time2)/86400) | fields - now starttime time2 | eval inc=case(inc>=days, 1, inc<21, 21, 1=1, inc) | fields - days | eval _key=username | stats max(inc) as inc by username username2 _key | fields _key inc username | outputlookup user_timer key_field=_key

panel.title: Top 25 Countries with Confirmed Cases (Over Time)

search.query: | fields - Lat Long "Province/State" | rename "Country/Region" as Country | stats sum(*) as * by Country | dedup Country | addtotals | sort 0 - Total | head 25 | fields - Total | transpose 0 column_name=_time header_field=Country | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%m/%d/%y") | sort 0 + _time | eval starttime="01012020" | eval time2=strptime(starttime,"%m%d%Y") | eval days=floor((_time-time2)/86400) | fields days * | appendcols [| rest /services/authentication/current-context | table username | rename username as "current_username"] | filldown current_username | rename current_username as username | lookup user_timer username | where days<inc | fields - days starttime time2 *username* | fields _time *
